verses.name: Matthew 27:5
verses.text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple, and departed, and went and hanged himself.

verses.name: Matthew 27:6
verses.text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces, and said, It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury, because it is the price of blood.

verses.name: Matthew 27:7
verses.text: And they took counsel, and bought with them the potter’s field, to bury strangers in.

verses.name: Matthew 27:8
verses.text: Wherefore that field was called, The field of blood, unto this day.
